## packedPoints variable

Similar to [points](./hiccup-svg.points.md)<!-- -->, but takes points from a single large flat buffer of coordinates with arbitrary striding.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
packedPoints: (pts: ArrayLike<number>, shape: string, size?: number, attribs?: any) => any[]
```

## Remarks

In addition to `shape` and `size`<!-- -->, the following attribs can be used to define the index range and strides:

- `start` - start index (default: 0) - `num` - number of points (default: buffer length/2) - `cstride` - component stride (default: 1) - `estride` - element stride (default: 2)
